**Example 1: 查询工作流画布示例**

查询工作流画布

Input: 

```
tccli wedata DescribeWorkflowCanvasInfo --cli-unfold-argument  \
    --WorkflowId your projectId \
    --ProjectId 86f1fbd0-f0f0-11ee
```

Output: 
